name: Teddy Tavern: A Culinary Adventure
summary: Unhappy in his day job as a short-order cook, Teddy decides to pursue his dream of becoming a master chef. The prestigious Culinary Master Competition is about to begin. Teddy must learn to cook many varieties of food, earn the satisfaction of the customers, and win five medals before entering the competition. Join Teddy in his quest to become the Culinary Master Competition.
